data.name: Who Stole My Sheep?
data.detailed_description:
In this turn-base 2D RPG style game, you find yourself venturing into different worlds where your abducted sheep might be located at. You meet different characters and each one of them has either something to say that guides you on your journey or prevent you from proceeding before you are declared the winner of your battle.

FEATURES:
-The Game is in the Arabic language only.
.

-Turn-base RPG fighting style.
.

-A story-rich world that is familiar to those following the Kafocado YouTube Channel.
.

The story revolves around a Shepard who had his sheep stolen from him by a mad king. It is unknown to him why his sheep is important for the king but our hero will do everything in his power to rescue his sheep for the mad king. To achieve that, he has to put up with different characters and their short comings, whether these characters will be helpful or just another block in the road.

data.short_description: Game only available in Arabic: Why not change the routine and look for a sheep instead?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 608 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
